messages.title: Vote Labour
messages.content: We will fight for Molyneux - its people, its priorities and its communities

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Lib Dems cannot win in Sefton Central. Remember, only Labour can beat the Tories in the new Sefton Central constituency in Parliament. The Lib Dems have won in local elections but not in a National one. It's a two horse race between Labour and Tory, whatever the Lib Dems may tell you.

images.caption: Vote Labour on Thursday May 6th - Bill Esterson, Tony Carr.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet warns against voting for the Liberal Democrats stating that 'only Labour can stop the Tories', highlighting the tactical voting considerations in Sefton Central.
